reviewText: Good Film with a great performances by all main stars.
Vince Spano is why I watched it but the movie itself was not good. Characters lacked chemistry
Old story of acceptance of homosexuality and the long term pain families endure.  Good story, but tired.

One of my all time favorite movies. It's a trip down memory lane having grown up in the area this was filmed in. The director really portrayed the scenery well as well as the message. Such a powerful story that these actors portrayed beautifully. Lea Thompson makes the movie for me, but Danny Nucci, and Vincent Spano excel as well. Stephen Spinella plays his role superbly. I would highly recommend this movie.
considering that the disc came all of the way from england that was good service. i was very satisited the the company.

Loved this movie.  Its a great story, I would love to do the AIDS LifeCycle and it gives you some knowledge about the trip from San Francisco to LA.  I really cant complain, Im happy to have it in my collection.
